name: Clark | HOOVA VR
description: Hoova, a room-scale VR experience, explores a dark, dystopian future and investigates topics of isolation, dependency and identity in Virtual Reality.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4590 CPU @ 3.30GHz, 3301 Mhz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: NVIDIA Virtual Audio Device
